name: Waking Forest
description:
Waking Forest

A game about a person trying to recall their memories after waking up in a forest

You don't know how you got there, but one thing is certain - you need to explore

Search the woods, and maybe you'll start to remember

We would like you to give us feedback after playing the game by accessing this LINK

Game Features
  • Mystical story
  • Thrilling puzzles
  • Hidden lore
Controls
  • "Enter" - to start 
  • "Z" - to interact and push
  • "WASD" or "arrow keys" - to move the character 
Credits

Dar Solntsev

Alexandre Romao 

Pedro Videira

This game was made with GB Studio.
